entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -25.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 08:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -25.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -29.2°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
